name: part_008
file: tmp_【#SSholoX1周年】世界の全てを見せてやろう【お披露目満載！？】 [fzlZDM_M5bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The holoX members play a giant seesaw game, screaming and cheering as they reach their goal.
A special transition scene where the holoX members lie down and talk about their absent leader, La+ Darknesss, and her good qualities.
The members return to their secret base set and notice a poster about an Animate Fair.

subtitles.original: 揺れ！巨大シーソー！
subtitles.english: Swaying! Giant Seesaw!

subtitles.original: あれ？思ったより行けたな。
subtitles.english: Oh? We did better than I thought.

subtitles.original: 最初のなんだったんだ。
subtitles.english: What was that at first?

subtitles.original: しかもズルしようとしてて私達。
subtitles.english: And we were even trying to cheat.

subtitles.original: ねえ。全然あれ入れられなかったね。
subtitles.english: Yeah. We couldn't get any in at all.

subtitles.original: 横着はダメ。
subtitles.english: No cutting corners.

subtitles.original: ということでね、目標の1000回よりもはるかに上で...
subtitles.english: So, we're far above our goal of 1000...

subtitles.original: もう疲れちゃった、ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: I'm already tired, wait a second.

subtitles.original: ゲットできたね。
subtitles.english: We got it, didn't we?

subtitles.original: ということで目標達成したので、アジトに戻りましょうか、みんなと一緒にね。
subtitles.english: So, since we achieved our goal, shall we head back to the hideout together?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: ということで、アジトにレッツゴー！
subtitles.english: So, let's go to the hideout!

subtitles.original: ちょっとさ、今ここでさ、ラプラスいないからさ、ラプラスのさ、いい所言っていかない？
subtitles.english: Hey, since La+ isn't here right now, why don't we talk about her good points?

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ！
subtitles.english: Oh, sure!

subtitles.original: クソガキなところ。
subtitles.english: Her bratty side.

subtitles.original: なんでも許したくなっちゃうよね。
subtitles.english: It makes you want to forgive anything.

subtitles.original: それいい所なのか、クソガキ？
subtitles.english: Is being a brat a good thing?

subtitles.original: 一周回っていい所だよね。
subtitles.english: It's a good point in a roundabout way.

subtitles.original: あとなんか、美味しいものとか貰った時に、「は！嬉しい！」
subtitles.english: Also, like when she gets something delicious, she goes, "Ha! I'm so happy!"

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃピュアだよね。
subtitles.english: She's so incredibly pure.

subtitles.original: 全身で震えて喜んでるところ。
subtitles.english: The way she trembles with joy all over.

subtitles.original: 確かに。しかも残さず食べてくれるでござるよな、ちゃんとね。
subtitles.english: True. And she finishes everything without leaving any leftovers, doesn't she?

subtitles.original: ねえ。可愛い。可愛い。
subtitles.english: Yeah. Cute. Cute.

subtitles.original: お子様だけどね。
subtitles.english: Even though she's like a child.

subtitles.original: いろはちゃんは？
subtitles.english: What about you, Iroha-chan?

subtitles.original: え、でもなんか、ラプラス様って、めちゃくちゃ毒吐くけど...
subtitles.english: Well, La+ says some pretty harsh things, but...

subtitles.original: 最後はちゃんと「ごめんな、今日言い過ぎた」みたいな感じでフォローしてくれる...
subtitles.english: In the end, she properly follows up with something like, "Sorry, I said too much today."

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だろう。裏で風真のなんか色々バラしてるから今日お返しでござる。
subtitles.english: It'll be fine. Since she's revealed various things about me behind the scenes, today is my payback.

subtitles.original: あとすごい4人のこと見てくれない？
subtitles.english: Also, doesn't she look out for the four of us a lot?

subtitles.original: あ、そうね。確かに。
subtitles.english: Ah, right. Definitely.

subtitles.original: なんか、好きなのかなって勘違いすることあるよね。
subtitles.english: Sometimes I misunderstand and think, "Wait, does she like us?"

subtitles.original: いや、好きなんだよ、きっと。
subtitles.english: No, she definitely likes us.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: あれ、好きか？ファンか？みたいな気持ちになることない？
subtitles.english: Doesn't it make you feel like, "Wait, does she like us? Is she a fan?"

subtitles.original: こよりのこと好きだよね。
subtitles.english: She likes Koyori, doesn't she?

subtitles.original: 確かに。あ、こよりだけだったか。
subtitles.english: True. Ah, it was just Koyori.

subtitles.original: えへー。あと何だろう？意外に...あ、線引かれたわ。
subtitles.english: Hehe. What else? Surprisingly... Ah, she drew a line.

subtitles.original: やでも確かに。なんかラプラスのいい所ってさ、意外とみんなのこと大好きだよね。
subtitles.english: But it's true. One of La+'s good points is that she surprisingly loves everyone.

subtitles.original: もこもこ配信見てるし。
subtitles.english: She watches the moko-moko streams.

subtitles.original: そうそう。ウフフフ。確かに。心に来るからね。
subtitles.english: Right, right. Hahaha. Definitely. It really hits home.

subtitles.original: ガチじゃん。
subtitles.english: She's serious.

subtitles.original: 早く体調治ってほしいな。
subtitles.english: I hope she gets better soon.

subtitles.original: ねえ。マジで。
subtitles.english: Yeah. Seriously.

subtitles.original: 早く元気になれ。元気になれ、お薬飲め。なれ！
subtitles.english: Get well soon. Get well, take your medicine. Get well!

subtitles.original: お薬して！ホットにして！暖かくして！
subtitles.english: Use your medicine! Keep it hot! Stay warm!

subtitles.original: 好きなラプラス！
subtitles.english: We love La+!

subtitles.original: しょうがないから好きだよ。
subtitles.english: We love her because we can't help it.

subtitles.original: 大好きだよ！
subtitles.english: We love you!

subtitles.original: というわけで、アジトに戻ってまいりました！
subtitles.english: And so, we've returned to the hideout!

subtitles.original: ただいまー！
subtitles.english: We're home!

subtitles.original: やー、どうだった？
subtitles.english: So, how was it?

subtitles.original: え、疲れたよ。
subtitles.english: Man, I'm tired.

subtitles.original: あんなに体力使うと思わなかった。
subtitles.english: I didn't think it would take that much energy.

subtitles.original: まさかシャトルランすると思わなかった。
subtitles.english: I never thought we'd be doing a shuttle run.

subtitles.original: え、でも楽しかったね。
subtitles.english: But it was fun, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 楽しかったー！
subtitles.english: It was fun!

subtitles.original: ということで目標も達成したということで、ここで告知をさせていただきましょう。
subtitles.english: So, since we achieved our goal, let's make some announcements here.

subtitles.original: はい、はーい！
subtitles.english: Yes, yes!

subtitles.original: え？あ、待って。後ろになんか貼ってない？あれ？これこれこれ。
subtitles.english: Eh? Ah, wait. Isn't there something posted in the back? Oh? This, this, this.

subtitles.original: 本当だ。なんかある。これはもしカして？
subtitles.english: It's true. There's something there. Could this be?

subtitles.original: あ！これ、アニメイト？
subtitles.english: Ah! Is this Animate?

subtitles.original: そう、アニメイトフェアが実施中でございます。もうみんなアニメイトさんには行ったかな？
subtitles.english: Yes, the Animate Fair is currently underway. Has everyone already gone to Animate?

subtitles.original: 行ったかね？行ったかね？
subtitles.english: Have you gone? Have you gone?
